title: Jerome Anderson car accident

evidence.description: This is a counterfeit cigarette, clearly made without the proper licensing
Jerome Anderson blood sample found at the site of the accident

crimeDescription: The suspect failed to stop after a fatal car accident and they were found to be in possession of counterfeit cigarettes
